favourite.article: All sufficient grace He giveth! Praise the Lord!
Thanks for this web site. I love all the songs. Easy for me to choose a hymn for my choir. Thank You Again.
What release the Savior gave us!! Christ INDEED has set us free........

Praise God for His Christ, our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ. For today, by becoming the life-giving Spirit to indwell us He has become everything to us and by His resurrection life and power He is 'The' power within us conquering sin, death, darkness and every degradation and corruption within and without of us. Oh Lord Jesus keep us in this enjoyment of Your Person in our being, Lord. Amen. Lord Jesus we love You. Amen.
Christ made us more than conqueror! Praise the Lord!
